channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Cobertura Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Cobertura Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2138|2024-08-04T07:01:40.836Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20cobertura%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Cobertura Plugin 1.15 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.

item.title: CVE-2020-2139|2024-08-04T07:01:41.043Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20cobertura%20plugin
item.description: An arbitrary file write vulnerability in Jenkins Cobertura Plugin 1.15 and earlier allows attackers able to control the coverage report file contents to overwrite any file on the Jenkins master file system.
